mapper.select: SELECT message.id AS "id", message.shop_id AS "shop.id", message.is_read AS "isRead", message.read_date AS "readDate", message.earning AS "earning", message.product_name AS "productName", message.consumer AS "consumer", message.quantity AS "quantity", message.create_date AS "createDate", message.order_number AS "orderNumber", (CASE WHEN message.type = 5 THEN '一级分红' WHEN message.type = 10 or message.type = 8 THEN '二级分红' END) AS "bonusLevel", (CASE WHEN message.type = 5 OR message.type = 8 or message.type = 10 THEN 5 ELSE message.type END) AS "type", message.share_name AS "shareName" FROM ec_message_earning message WHERE message.shop_id = #{shop.id} ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT (SELECT count(1) FROM ec_message_flag WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_read = 0)AS "MSG_SYSTEM_NOT_READ", (SELECT count(1) FROM ec_message_earning WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_read = 0)AS "MSG_FUND_NOT_READ", (SELECT count(1) FROM ec_message_order WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_read = 0)AS "MSG_ORDER_NOT_READ", (SELECT count(1) FROM ec_message_remind WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_read = 0)AS "MSG_REMIND_NOT_READ"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ec_message_earning( id, shop_id, is_read, create_date, consumer, earning, product_name, quantity, order_number, type, share_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shop.id}, 0, now(), #{consumer}, #{earning}, #{productName}, #{quantity}, #{orderNumber}, #{type}, #{shareName} )
